transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hi Ankita, Anshika this side.
Customer: Ha boliye na.
Customer: Ji na aapne na ek wrong BL and cat karke na ek ticket dali hui hai.
Executive: Kya? Complaint dali hui hai wrong BL and cat.
Customer: Nahi nahi, kab dali?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Kab dali hai complaint kya?
Customer: Aaj 17 November hai na ha 17 November ko hi.
Executive: Nahi aaj to nahi hai ek minute.
Customer: Kya mam?
Executive: Boliye na.
Executive: Mai bol rahi hu Ankita wrong BL and cat ki complaint aayi hui hai yaha pe.
Executive: BL and cat ki.
Customer: Are buyleads ki buyleads ki regarding aapne complaint dali hui hai na.
Customer: Ha. Aapne BL and cat mark kar rakha hai 17 ha to isi ke regarding puch rahi thi kya issue aa raha hai ab.
Customer: Complaint to usme call kiya tha na aapko.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji kiya tha aapko maine aapko bataya tha. Haan haan mere ko aawaz aa rahi hai aapki.
Executive: Hello. Ha to.
Customer: Ha to wo solve ho gaya na fir. Lekar ke wo uske.
Executive: To fir abhi abhi nahi issue aa raha hai na iske regarding kuch bhi. Nahi. Nahi nahi kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Kuch nahi aa raha hai issue abhi leads aa rahi hai to mai call karti hu unko. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Leads aa rahi hai abhi aapke paas.
Customer: Ha jo home ka wagera tha na shifting ka wo abhi nahi aati hai. Ha. Abhi shifting. Achha wo. Ha. Household wagera nahi aata aapko.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi aata hai. Aur ye shifting kya bol rahe hai aap shifting samajh nahi aaya.
Customer: Shifting kya?
Executive: Ji aapki mai ticket close kar du. Ticket close kar du ya BL and cat wali aapki.
Customer: Ha problem solve ho gaya abhi to leads aa rahi hai na. Ha. To aapke paas aapke paas na CLN yes or no ka wo aayega option. Okay. Abhi jab hamari call close ho jayegi na call band ho jayega. Humne na complaint complaint nahi dali thi.
Executive: Ticket raise ki hogi aapne ticket raise ho rakhi hai yaha pe madam isliye ticket raise ho rakhi hai. Aapne na matlab complaint nahi dali hogi aapne na BL mark kiya hoga wrong BL mark kiya hoga aapne. Hai na. Thik hai wo wrong BL. Mai usko close kar dungi. Abhi to na aapke paas na ek message aayega CLN yes or no ka.
Customer: Thik hai kar deti hu. Hello. To usme na ha kar dijiye. Ek minute ek minute Ankita. Ha. To aap na yes kar dijiyega usme. Ha ha ha. Hai na yes kijiyega kyuki aap jaise na mai batati hu yaha pe kyu ye complaint wo ho gayi hai kyuki aapne na jo BL hai na buyleads wo wrong mark kari hogi. To aisa aapne repeated kiya hoga repeated us pe. Bahut bar kar diya hoga.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hello. Thik hai wo kar wo kar do aap mai yes kar deti hu. Aap yes kar dijiyega aur abhi leads mil rahi hai to deal ho rahi hai koi?
Customer: Nahi abhi to kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Lekin relevant buyleads dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Ha dikh rahi hai machine shifting ka dikh rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Ha kyuki aapne na abhi wo score bhi thik kar diya. Appreciate. Ye maine itne time se Disha ko bola tha Disha nahi kar rahi thi.
Customer: Okay. Abhi score kya dikh raha hai kya?
Executive: Abhi score 92.3% dikh raha hai. This is very very good.
Customer: Ha kyuki mai itne time se Disha ko bol rahi thi tab usne nahi kiya tha.
Executive: Ha wo to fir.
Executive: Ab ye thik ho gaya 92.3% aur yaha pe aapke do number map hai. Price aapko batana nahi hai hai na.
Executive: Price to reveal nahi karna hume.
Executive: Price reveal nahi karna na.
Customer: Nahi. Ha to mai na is complaint ko band karungi aapke paas notification aayega aap yes dijiyega.
Executive: Aur to koi issue nahi hai. Koi issue ho to mujhe call message kuch bhi kar sakti ho aap. Thik hai. Ha ha ha. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mam. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had a complaint regarding BL and cat.

- Customer was not receiving relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the customer's issue.

- Executive informed the customer about CLN process.

- Executive fixed the customer's score.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a notification to confirm.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaint, score, shifting
